scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.infra:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.postgres:connect: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_postgres
scripts.postgres:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_postgres -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_postgres -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/01-postgres-schema.sql && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_postgres -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-postgres-seed.sql
scripts.clickhouse:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS boilerplate_analytics; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS boilerplate_clickhouse; CREATE DATABASE boilerplate_clickhouse;" && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T clickhouse clickhouse-client --multiquery < packages/database/clickhouse-schema.sql && pnpm clickhouse:seed
scripts.clickhouse:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T clickhouse clickhouse-client --multiquery < packages/database/clickhouse-seed.sql
